name: Sky: Tournament
description:
Sky: Tournament is a parkour game with speedrunning abilities with different ways of winning on the skyscrapers. 

You can run on WASD, jump on Space and slide pressing Ctrl.

There are some special blocks: Red is killing you. Green is finish. Purple is trampoline. Blue is moving platform.

Try to beat my highscore in this game - 00:41:412.

Good luck, have fun!
